nodes.title: Teknically Part 1: The 389 Day Laurier BBA
nodes.excerpt: Today I declined my co-op offer. Last week, I deferred all my classes. My time as a full time BBA student at Wilfrid Laurier University is…
nodes.description: My first year as a BBA student at Wilfrid Laurier University was unlike anything imaginable. I started a business, travelled the world, and now I'm free.

nodes.title: Meet the Link
nodes.excerpt: I was a marketing specialist for Wilfrid Laurier University's best business club, The Link in 2013-2014. I did video production, photography…
nodes.description: As marketing specialist for Laurier's The Link business club, I got diverse experience in digital marketing and was awarded Executive of the Year.

nodes.title: 5 Days for the Homeless
nodes.excerpt: Every March, 5 Days for the Homeless campaigns on campuses across Canada raise awareness and funds for youth homelessness. At Wilfrid…
nodes.description: Video helps 5 Days team raise $25k for Kitchener Waterloo homeless youth.

nodes.title: Sam Lambert for President
nodes.excerpt: Sam Lambert was the underdog going into the 2014 WLUSU* Presidential campaign. Other candidates focused…
nodes.description: Sam Lambert won a tight race for President. Andrew helped develop the winning strategy, web, and video marketing.
